column1: EVTDESC800001;Citizens across our country celebrate as our flag is raised in the capital once again. We have the Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire

column2: their leaders have met in Vienna to re-affirm their oaths to the Holy Roman Emperor. $FROMCOUNTRY$ is once again a prince of the HRE!;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPT800002;We welcome them with open arms!;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
